item.title: Climate Risk Assessment in Western North Carolina
item.description: Collaborators BB Cutts (NC State), RE Emanuel (NC State), KL Martin (NC State), KM Suttles (USFS), JM Vose (USFS), DN Wear (USFS), JW Coulston (USFS) Timeline 2017-2019 Project Goal The goal of this project is to combine past and future hydrology model (i.e., Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT)) outputs with demographics data to create maps and prioritize climate change adaptation planning for especially vulnerable communities in western North Carolina’s Yadkin-Pee Dee River Watershed.
